    public final class XMLDOMComment
extends XMLDOMCharacterData
    A JavaScript object for MSXML's (ActiveX) XMLDOMComment.
    Represents the content of an XML comment.
    Author:
    Mirko Friedenhagen, Ahmed Ashour, Frank Danek
    See Also:
    MSDN documentation, Serialized Form
